00024 /*! file CELFileConverter.h Defines a class for converting CEL files between GCOS and Calvin format. */
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConversionOptions.h"
00027 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConverterErrorCode.h"
00028 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileVersion.h"
00029 //
00030 #include <cstring>
00031 #include <string>
00032 //
00033 
00034 namespace affymetrix_cel_converter
00035 {
00036 
00037 /*! This class will convert a CEL file between GCOS and Calvin formats. */
00038 class CELFileConverter
00039 {
00040 public:
00041 
00042         /*! Constructor */
00043         CELFileConverter();
00044 
00045         /*! Destructor */
00046         ~CELFileConverter();
00047 
00048         /*! Gets the error code for the conversion process.
00049          * @return The error code associated with the last failure.
00050          */
00051         CELFileConverterErrorCode ErrorCode() const { return errorCode; }
00052 
00053         /*! Convert the file to the specified format.
00054          * @param fileName The full path name of the CEL file.
00055          * @param fileVersion The file version to convert to.
00056          * @return True if successful.
00057          */
00058         bool ConvertFile(const char *fileName, CELFileVersionType fileVersion, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL);
00059 
00060         /*! Convert the file to the specified format.
00061          * @param fileName The full path name of the input CEL file.
00062          * @param newFileName The full path name of the new CEL file to be written.
00063          * @param fileVersion The file version to convert to.
00064          * @return True if successful.
00065          */
00066         bool ConvertFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFileName, CELFileVersionType fileVersion, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL);
00067 
00068 private:
00069 
00070         /*! Clears the members. */
00071         void Clear();
00072 
00073         /*! The error code. */
00074         CELFileConverterErrorCode errorCode;
00075 
00076     /*! Basic Checks. */
00077     bool Checks(const char *fileName, CELFileVersionType fileVersion);
00078 
00079 };
00080 
00081 }
00082 
00083 #endif
